name: RHCamera
0:
”Alexa,talk to doorbell”
”Alexa,show doorbell”
”Alexa, answer the doorbell”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To view activity from your camera, say:
“Alexa, show the doorbell”

To stop your camera say:
“Alexa, hide the doorbell”
“Alexa, go home.”
“Alexa, stop.”
